    • listCategories

      @Select("select * from bookcategory where parent_id =#{cid}") @Result(column="category_id",property="categoryId") @Result(column="category_id",property="children",many=@Many(select="com.example.sb_bookstore.mapper.BookCategoryMapper.listCategories")) List<BookCategory> listCategories(Integer cid)
